text: I was only making a point about Long’s line (which I think is a good suggestion) on providing context for underrepresented genders wrt to the “cis and transwomen” part, I did not say anything about transmen. (There is a post with a similar line that I thought was pretty good btw: <https://medium.com/@quinncrossley/uplifting-diverse-genders-beyond-women-and-non-binary-916c890f2185>)

attachments.title: Uplifting Diverse Genders: Beyond “Women and Non-Binary”
attachments.text: A primer on using inclusive language in your career programs, initiatives, and networking groups to better welcome all diverse genders.
attachments.fallback: Medium: Uplifting Diverse Genders: Beyond “Women and Non-Binary”
